edu.iastate.ansci.flip

Class ChromosomeInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iastate.ansci.flip.DefaultFloatingPointBoundedRangeModel
      • edu.iastate.ansci.flip.MultiThumbBoundedRangeModel
        • edu.iastate.ansci.flip.ChromosomeInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Changeable, FloatingPointBoundedRangeModel, java.io.Serializable

    public class ChromosomeInfo
extends MultiThumbBoundedRangeModel
implements Changeable, java.io.Serializable
    Holds all the information that pertains to a physical chromosome-pair (including sex chromosomes). The length of the chromosome is the distance between the most widely spaced loci, in centiMorgans.
    This information is then used by an Animal to create a Chromosome.
    Extends MultiThumbBoundedRangeModel to allow MultiThumbSliders to be created for manipulating the positions of the loci.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getNumSexLoci

        public int getNumSexLoci()
        Gets the number of loci in the "sex-linked" region of this chromosome. This should be 0 for a non-sex chromosome.
        Sex-linked loci, are those with negative values for DefaultSlidable.getValue()
        Returns:
        the number of "sex-linked" loci

      • indexOf

        public int indexOf(java.lang.Object ob)
        Finds the relative position of an object within this ChromosomeInfo. If the object is not a LocusInfo, a -1 will be returned.
        Parameters:
        ob - the obj
        Returns:
        the position of the object within this chromosome

      • isManual

        public boolean isManual()
        Tests if the binomial parameters should be allowed to be set manually.
        If false they should be calculated from the length of this chromosome.
        If true, only the 'N' values should be allow "free rein" with the 'p' values determined appropriately
        Returns:
        true if the binomial parameters should be allowed to be set manually

      • isSex

        public boolean isSex()
        Tests if this is a sex chromosome
        Returns:
        true if this is a sex chromosome

        public void setSex(boolean b)
        If true, then this is a sex chromosome and capable of having "sex-linked" loci.
        Default is false.
        Parameters:
        b - true if this should be a sex chromosome
